name: Paul Horner
body:
## About Me

I'm a learning technologist and web developer working for Northumbria University in Newcastle. I'm unashamedly a Django, Python and JQuery aficionado.  But I've also used other stuff when necessary.

I have a passion for innovation and take great pride in producing simple, easy to use solutions.


### My Websites
* [Law School Webcasts](https://law-webcasts.northumbria.ac.uk)
* [Bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org/paulh)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/paulhorner79/)
* [LinkedIn](http://uk.linkedin.com/pub/paul-horner/3/1a5/b1b)
* [Last.fm](http://last.fm/phorner/)
* [Twitter](http://twitter.com/thePaulHorner/)


### Contact
Send me an email - paulhorner79[at]gmail.com
